ai.summary: A short, easy 4.5 km hike from Colinswell to Dunearn in the UK. The route offers gentle terrain and scenic countryside views, ideal for beginners and families seeking a relaxed outdoor outing with the option to extend or return the same way.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly well-made paths with a mix of grassy fields, woodland edges, and light gravel sections. The route features gentle gradients and minimal elevation gain, making for a relaxed low-effort walk.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast and daylight hours before you go. Stay on marked paths, watch for other trail users, and keep dogs under control. Bring a map or GPS, a charged phone, and tell someone your plans. Wear sturdy shoes and bring layers, as UK weather can change quickly and paths can become muddy after rain.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device (or offline map on phone)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) are best for this hike due to longer daylight and drier trails; winter visits are possible but often muddy and with shorter daylight.

seo.title: Colinswell to Dunearn: Easy 4.5 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover the easy 4.5 km Colinswell to Dunearn trail in the UK. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and essential gear for a relaxed countryside hike.
seo.h1: Colinswell to Dunearn 4.5 km Easy Hike
